description: The storage domain inventory dashboard include storage domain inventory list and disk usage

panels.content: ###### This dashboard include inventory list and disk usage for the selected storage domain.

panels.description: This report displays a inventory list of all storage domains of the selected data center.

targets.rawSql:
--BR47 - This query returns for a specific datacenter, the storage domains list,
-- along with their configuration details, available disk size, 
-- used disk size and total, up to an hour back.

-- storage_domain_type and storage_type will be returned in localised session language.
SELECT
    storage_domain_name,
    v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id,
    a.value AS storage_domain_type,
    b.value AS storage_type,
    available_disk_size_gb, 
    used_disk_size_gb,
    ( available_disk_size_gb + used_disk_size_gb ) AS total_size,
    create_date,
    delete_date
FROM 
    v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains
    INNER JOIN v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains
        ON 
            (
                v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
                v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
                -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
                AND v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.datacenter_id =
                    CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS uuid )
                -- Here we get the latest map
                AND v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.history_id 
                    IN 
                        (
                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                            FROM v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains a
                            GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id, a.datacenter_id
                        )
            )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
        (
            SELECT
                enum_translator.enum_type,
                enum_translator.enum_key,
                enum_translator.value
            FROM enum_translator
            WHERE language_code = 'en_US'
        ) AS a
        ON 
            (
                storage_domain_type = a.enum_key
                AND a.enum_type = 'STORAGE_DOMAIN_TYPE'
            )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
        (
            SELECT
                enum_translator.enum_type,
                enum_translator.enum_key,
                enum_translator.value
            FROM enum_translator
            WHERE language_code = 'en_US'
        ) AS b
        ON 
            (
                storage_type = b.enum_key
                AND b.enum_type = 'STORAGE_TYPE'
            )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
        (
            SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
            union
            SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
        ) AS hourly_daily
        ON 
            (
                v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
                hourly_daily.storage_domain_id
                AND hourly_daily.history_id 
                    IN 
                        (
                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                            FROM             
                                (   
                                    SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
                                    union
                                    SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
                                ) AS a    
                            GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
                        )
            )
WHERE
    v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id IN ($storage_id)
    -- Here we filter by the storage type chosen by the user
    -- If "All" storage types were chosen by the user then the
    -- parameter "P_Storage_Type" equals to -1
    AND storage_domain_type IN ($storage_type)
    -- Here we get the storage domain latest configurations
    AND v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.history_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains AS a
                GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
            )
    -- This will determine where deleted entities will be included in the report,
    -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
    AND
        CASE
          WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
              THEN 1=1
          WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
              THEN delete_date isnull
        END
ORDER BY storage_domain_name

panels.title: Storage Domains Inventory (BR47)

panels.description: This report displays average available disk size for the selected data center and storage domain over a selected period.

targets.rawSql:
-- BR21 - This query returns for a specific storage domain
-- the average available disk size per hour over the chosen period.

SELECT DISTINCT
    $__time(sub_query.history_datetime),
    COALESCE 
        (
            storage_domain_name,
            MAX ( storage_domain_name ) over ( partition BY 1 ),
            ''
        ) AS storage_domain_name,
    available_disk_size
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime,
            AVG ( available_disk_size_gb ) AS available_disk_size
        FROM
            (
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
                UNION
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
            ) AS hourly_daily,
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains
        WHERE
            -- Here we join the the storage domain configurations table with the statistics table
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
            hourly_daily.storage_domain_id
            -- Here we filter by the storage domain chosen by the user
            AND hourly_daily.storage_domain_id IN ($storage_id)
            AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
            AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
            -- Here we get the latest storage domain configurations
            AND v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.history_id 
                IN 
                    (
                        SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                        FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains a
                        GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
                    )
        GROUP BY
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime
    ) AS sub_query
ORDER BY sub_query.history_datetime

panels.title: Storage Domain Available Size (over time) (BR21)

panels.description: This report displays average used disk size for the selected data center and storage domain over a selected period.

targets.rawSql:
-- BR21 - This query returns for a specific storage domain
-- the average used disk size per hour for the chosen period.

SELECT DISTINCT
    $__time(sub_query.history_datetime),
    COALESCE 
        (
            storage_domain_name,
            MAX ( storage_domain_name ) over ( partition BY 1 ),
            ''
        ) AS storage_domain_name,
    used_disk_size
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime,
            AVG ( used_disk_size_gb ) AS used_disk_size
        FROM
            (
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
                UNION
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
            ) AS hourly_daily,
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains
        WHERE
            -- Here we join the the storage domain configurations table with the statistics table
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
            hourly_daily.storage_domain_id
            -- Here we filter by the storage domain chosen by the user
            AND hourly_daily.storage_domain_id IN ($storage_id)
            AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
            AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
            -- Here we get the latest storage domain configurations
            AND v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.history_id 
                IN 
                    (
                    SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                    FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains a
                    GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
                    )
        GROUP BY
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime
    ) AS sub_query
ORDER BY sub_query.history_datetime

panels.title: Storage Domain Used Size (over time) (BR21)

panels.description: This report displays used disk size versus available disk size ( total disk size ) for the selected data center and storage domain over a selected period.

targets.rawSql:
-- BR21 - This query returns for a specific storage domain
-- the available disk size versus used disk size ( total disk size ), 
-- per hour for the chosen period.

SELECT DISTINCT
    $__time(sub_query.history_datetime),
    COALESCE 
        (
            storage_domain_name,
            MAX ( storage_domain_name ) over ( partition BY 1 ),
            ''
        ) AS storage_domain_name,
    used_disk_size AS "( Used disk size )",
    available_disk_size AS "( Available disk size )"
    --,( available_disk_size + used_disk_size ) AS "( Total disk size )"
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime,
            AVG ( available_disk_size_gb ) AS available_disk_size,
            AVG ( used_disk_size_gb ) AS used_disk_size
        FROM
            (
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
                UNION
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
            ) AS hourly_daily,
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains
        WHERE
            -- Here we join the the storage domain configurations table with the statistics table
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
            hourly_daily.storage_domain_id
            -- Here we filter by the storage domain chosen by the user
            AND hourly_daily.storage_domain_id IN ($storage_id)
            AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
            AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
            -- Here we get the latest storage domain configurations
            AND v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.history_id 
                IN 
                    (
                        SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                        FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains a
                        GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
                    )
        GROUP BY
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime
    ) AS sub_query
    ORDER BY sub_query.history_datetime

panels.title: Storage Domain Total Size (over time) (BR21)

panels.description: This report displays total used disk size for the selected data center and storage domain over a selected period.

targets.rawSql:
-- BR21 - This query returns for a specific storage domain
-- the total used disk size per hour for the chosen period.

SELECT DISTINCT
    $__time(sub_query.history_datetime),
    COALESCE 
        (
            storage_domain_name,
            MAX ( storage_domain_name ) over ( partition BY 1 ),
            ''
        ) AS storage_domain_name,
    used_disk_size
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime,
            AVG ( used_disk_size_gb ) AS used_disk_size
        FROM
            (
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
                UNION
                SELECT * FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
            ) AS hourly_daily,
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains
        WHERE
            -- Here we join the the storage domain configurations table with the statistics table
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
            hourly_daily.storage_domain_id
            -- Here we filter by the storage domain chosen by the user
            AND hourly_daily.storage_domain_id IN ($storage_id)
            AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
            AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
            -- Here we get the latest storage domain configurations
            AND v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.history_id 
                IN 
                    (
                        SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                        FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains a
                        GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
                    )
        GROUP BY
            v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
            history_datetime
    ) AS sub_query
ORDER BY sub_query.history_datetime

panels.title: Storage Domain Total Used Size (over time) (BR21)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_name AS __text , datacenter_id AS __value FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_name AS __text , datacenter_id AS __value FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT     CAST (         v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id AS varchar     ) AS __value,     CASE         WHEN detach_date IS NULL             THEN storage_domain_name         ELSE             storage_domain_name             ||             ' ('             ||             'Detached on'             ||             ' '             ||             TO_CHAR (                 detach_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'             )             ||             ')'     END AS __text FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains         INNER JOIN v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains             ON (                 v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =                 v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id                 AND v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.datacenter_id =                 CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS uuid )             ) WHERE v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_type IN ($storage_type )     AND v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.history_id IN (         SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )         FROM v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains a         GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id, a.datacenter_id     )     AND v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.history_id IN (         SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )         FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains a         GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id     )     AND         CASE           WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'           THEN 1=1           WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'           THEN detach_date isnull         END     AND         CASE           WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'           THEN 1=1           WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'           THEN delete_date isnull         END ORDER BY     __text
list.label: Storage Domain
list.name: storage_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT     CAST (         v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id AS varchar     ) AS __value,     CASE         WHEN detach_date IS NULL             THEN storage_domain_name         ELSE             storage_domain_name             ||             ' ('             ||             'Detached on'             ||             ' '             ||             TO_CHAR (                 detach_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'             )             ||             ')'     END AS __text FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains         INNER JOIN v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains             ON (                 v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =                 v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id                 AND v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.datacenter_id =                 CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS uuid )             ) WHERE v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_type IN ($storage_type )     AND v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.history_id IN (         SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )         FROM v4_3_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains a         GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id, a.datacenter_id     )     AND v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains.history_id IN (         SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )         FROM v4_3_configuration_history_storage_domains a         GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id     )     AND         CASE           WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'           THEN 1=1           WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'           THEN detach_date isnull         END     AND         CASE           WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'           THEN 1=1           WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'           THEN delete_date isnull         END ORDER BY     __text

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT     enum_translator.value AS __text,     enum_translator.enum_key AS __value FROM enum_translator  WHERE     enum_translator.language_code = 'en_US'     AND enum_translator.enum_type ='STORAGE_DOMAIN_TYPE'
list.label: Storage Type
list.name: storage_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT     enum_translator.value AS __text,     enum_translator.enum_key AS __value FROM enum_translator  WHERE     enum_translator.language_code = 'en_US'     AND enum_translator.enum_type ='STORAGE_DOMAIN_TYPE'

title: Storage Domains Inventory Dashboard
